name: IPData
short: Get basic geolocation info on a public IP address.
description: Get basic geolocation info on a public IP address.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. This cog shows various info about given **>> __Public IP address__ <<** from ipdata.co API.

ℹ **Note:** Getting an API key is optional. However,
if you want to get/set your own API key for increased quota,
you can signup for it over at <https://ipdata.co/sign-up.html>.

Once you have the key, you can set it in your redbot instance with:```[p]set api ipdata api_key YOUR_KEY```
author: ow0x
